mapper.select: SELECT user_id, md_user_id FROM user WHERE md_user_id IS NOT NULL

SELECT user_id AS userId, nickname AS nickname, password AS password, pin_number AS pinNumber, birth AS birth, gender AS gender, phone_number AS phoneNumber, email AS email, md_user_id AS mdUserId, profile_url AS profileUrl, salary AS salary FROM user WHERE email = #{email};
mapper.insert: insert into user (nickname, password, phone_number, email, birth) values (#{nickname}, #{password}, #{phoneNumber}, #{email}, #{birth})
